0x4626756C.name: ADD_BLIP_FOR_RADIUS

params.name: posX
params.description: The x position of the blip (you can also send a vector3 instead of the bulk coordinates)

params.name: posY
params.description: The y position of the blip (you can also send a vector3 instead of the bulk coordinates)

params.name: posZ
params.description: The z position of the blip (you can also send a vector3 instead of the bulk coordinates)

params.name: radius
params.description: The number that defines the radius of the blip circle

0x4626756C.description:
Create a blip with a radius for the specified coordinates (it doesnt create the blip sprite, so you need to use [AddBlipCoords](#\_0xC6F43D0E))
Example image:
![example](https://i.imgur.com/9hQl3DB.png)

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [ADD_BLIP_FOR_RADIUS](?\_0x46818D79B1F7499A).**
0x4626756C.resultsDescription: The blip handle that can be manipulated with every `SetBlip` natives
